name: You're not alone...
description:
You wander into the cave and as you get ever deeper you feel as if you have a hundred eyes watching you.

Think to yourself; Do you truly want to see what is lurking in the dark?

------------------------

"You're not alone..." was made as a submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 22.2.

Isaac Bowes (Brand) and Squishy Chicky made this project in under a week in the Unity Game Engine.

All of the code and Sound design were done by Isaac all of the art was done by Squishy Chicky. Both of us took a heavy role in Design and creative direction for this project.
